org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.spark

Class LocalHiveSparkClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.spark.LocalHiveSparkClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Serializable, AutoCloseable, HiveSparkClient

    public class LocalHiveSparkClient
extends Object
implements HiveSparkClient
    LocalSparkClient submit Spark job in local driver, it's responsible for build spark client environment and execute spark work.
    See Also:
